body.name: Glade Air Freshener Odor Fighting Room Spray, Apple Cinnamon, 8.3 oz, 6 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 57 mins
features: Apple Cinnamon Glade Air Freshener Spray has a fragrance crafted by master perfumers, with notes of McIntosh apple, cinnamon spice, and sweet vanilla
Now with 2x more fragrance (vs Glade 7.6 oz spray), it’s easier than ever to enjoy waves of freshness – the can got a fashion makeover and the push button gives you improved comfort and control
Feel waves of fresh energy with this Glade air freshener – it uses 100% natural propellant, and is made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes
Surround yourself with a room air freshener fragrance infused with essential oils
Freshen any room in a spritz with this Glade aerosol spray – it makes it easy to add a refreshing spritz of personality to your home
body.description: It’s easier than ever to spice things up. Apple Cinnamon Glade Air Freshener Spray is now bursting with 2x more fragrance*, giving you extra power to revive the vibe. This air freshener for home use a fragrance crafted by master perfumers, with notes of McIntosh apple, cinnamon spice, and sweet vanilla. Surround yourself with a room air freshener fragrance infused with essential oils. Feel waves of fresh energy and get a fragrance boost that uses 100% natural propellent. It’s made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes. Surround yourself with a room air freshener fragrance infused with essential oils. Keep things comfy and get a fragrance boost that uses 100% natural propellent. It’s made without phthalates, parabens, formaldehyde, nitro musks or dyes. With 2x the fragrance*, keep things comfy and cozy with Apple Cinnamon. * vs Glade 7.6 oz spray

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works to clear bad smells, quickly. Be careful where you spray it as there is amist

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this apple cinnamon Glade air freshener! And I am glad it is available as not many stores around me carry it. The price is right and the apple cinnamon smell lasts a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: IT DOES WHAT IS SAYS. "AIR FRESHENER" BEEN USING GLADE PRODUCTS FOR MANY YEARS. HAD THE PLUG INS AND NOW THE SPRAYS...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not smell nearly as good as it used to
reviews.reviewText: I have an older can of this stuff in a smaller white and yellow bottle and it smells like heaven on earth. Glade's apple cinnamon spray used to be absolutely amazing.Something is off with the smell of this redesigned bottle, I don't really detect any cinnamon and the apples smell like they are close to rotting. It has a very wet, warm, and unclean scent that just makes me feel like something is off. Unfortunately, I will be tossing these out. I personally don't think anyone would like to make their rooms or cars small like thisI can recommend Glade's current pine and cedar spray, that is very clean smelling and enjoyable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice, helps freshen up rooms
reviews.reviewText: I got this set of six air fresheners to keep in various rooms in my house, but they are most often used in the bathroom. The scent smells very nice, but it's pretty strong, so if you are sensitive to smells, this may be too intense. You only need to spray a small amount, especially for a bathroom, and the sprayer is easy to operate. The smell lasts a decent amount of time, but it does start fading after a bit. Each bottle lasts a very long time, so I should be set for quite a while. Overall, these are good room fresheners and are good for any room of the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite room spray
reviews.reviewText: My favorite room spray. Doesn't "correct" poo smell as well as others b/c I don't think it's really designed to do that, but it's my all time favorite smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a mist air freshener
reviews.reviewText: The scent is very nice but you have to wipe it off surfaces. Who's got time for that? Why does it leave a wet residue on everything? Wanted air freshener spray, not this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This still smells good, but not is not as good as original
reviews.reviewText: This still smells good, but not is not as good as original
